title: Greek Yogurt Parfait
short_description:
A Greek Yogurt Parfait is a delightful blend of creamy yogurt, fresh fruits, and crunchy granola, perfect for a healthy and quick snack or breakfast. 
• 200g Greek yogurt 
• 1 tablespoon honey 
• 50g granola 
• 100g mixed berries (like strawberries, blueberries) 
• A sprinkle of cinnamon (optional)

steps.title: Layer Yogurt and Honey
steps.description: Spoon half of the Greek yogurt into a glass or bowl. Drizzle with half of the honey.

steps.title: Add Fruits and Granola
steps.description: Layer half of the mixed berries and half of the granola over the yogurt.

steps.title: Repeat Layers and Serve
steps.description: Repeat the layers with the remaining yogurt, honey, berries, and granola. Sprinkle with cinnamon if desired and serve immediately.
